abstract: Here's the latest batch of readers' responses to some of the shows collected through Storify.
snippet: Here's the latest batch of readers' responses to some of the shows collected through Storify.
lead_paragraph: It's Day 4 of the CMJ Music Marathon and critics from The Times aren't slowing down. Last night, @joncaramanica and @jonpareles covered the gamut of offerings in Brooklyn and the Lower East Side. But we can't be everywhere. This year, we've invited readers to join us in appraising CMJ shows on Twitter.

headline.main: CMJ Day 3: Twitter Reviews of Freshkills, AraabMuzik and More
